instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> ASD test failed: Tcon error
threads.message:
Hi,
On this board I replaced the LCD connector and the LCD (from China).
Apple test (D key) says no problem;
ASD EFI 3S156 is fully passed; 
ASD OS 3S156 shows the attached error.
ALS, camera, work fine.
What can provoke this issue? I checked again the LCD connector, all pins look good

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> ASD test failed: Tcon error
threads.message:
What's the problem with this machine?

ASD OS is not needed normally.
Good enough if ASD EFI is passed.
